Posts.Content: LaurieB51 wrote: In 1991 I had a hysterectomy for abnormal pap smears which could turn into cancer In 2005 I was diagnosed with Inflammatory Breast Cancer and an auto-immune disease called Dermatomyositis.  DM is a rash and affects muscles and caught my IBC before it spread to the lymphnodes.  I am 5 years Cancer Free.  I worry if there is any link to other cancers such as ovarian cancer?  Has anyone out there been diagnosed with Ovarian Cancer after IBC? Because I hurt from the DM it is hard to distingish if the pain is anything new because it moves around.  If anyone knows of a link between the 2 cancers please respond. Email:  laurienormbezaire@cogeco.ca Dx 1/2005, IBC, 0/14 nodes, ER-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Link between IBC and Ovarian Cancer LaurieB51 dreaming

Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2010 11:16PM LaurieB51 wrote: I have a pair in the closet and never wear them.  too hot and too heavy, just not natural.  I buy tops that gather or try to hide my no boob situation.  If you are near Windsor, ON, you can use mine!
